AI Description: wxWidgets is a C++ library that lets developers create applications for Windows, macOS, Linux and other platforms with a single code base. It is a mature and comprehensive framework that allows for native user interfaces with a wide range of widgets.
Core Features: Cross-Platform Gui Library, Native Look & Feel, Extensive Widget Set, Support For Various Platforms, Open-Source & Licensed Under The Wxwindows Library Licence
General Tags: Gui Library, Cross-Platform Development, Native User Interfaces, Open-Source Software
